history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Beatty Side Hospital
TTS Okay, going to randall l. beatty, md. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER now
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER now
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where would you like to leave from?
USER oh shit.
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you want to leave from?
USER Monroeville Mall
TTS Okay, leaving from monroeville mall. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER bidet
TTS Okay, going to new age bidet. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER 4 P.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 04:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Hello.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 40 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 16 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> WM Penn Hwy at Sam's Warehouse Drvwy. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER done

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 67 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Dallas avenue at Penham Pl.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 4:08pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER done
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 6 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 6901 Lynn Way, Pittsburgh, PA 15208, USA. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> This is route 2 of 4, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 31 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> P67 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> East Busway at Homewood Station D.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 4:20pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER done
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 10 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 6901 Lynn Way, Pittsburgh, PA 15208, USA. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER TP
TTS Let me know when you're ready to continue.
